page.title: 09Occupations in Stamford Br.
page.content: In the village we have a factory that makes plastic goods like toilet seats.My next door neighbour works there.A lot of the people in the village work there.Most people work outside the village in places like Leeds and York and sometimes even further.Most people get there by bus or car.However most people who work in public houses are local people as are those who work in local shops.Some people who work in banks or building societies come from outside the village.Other people have their own businesses, such as market gardening and dress-making, which they operate from their homes.Mr. Fountain is selfemployed.He has his own business working with timber.Dixons build houses and extensions for houses and garages.They also built our new cricket pavilion.Unemployment only 3%.
